sentences.sContent: Do you do homework every day?
sentences.sCn: 你们每天都做家庭作业吗？

sentences.sContent: The most common use of library computers by teenagers was to do homework.
sentences.sContent_eng: The most common use of library computers by teenagers was to do homework.
sentences.sCn: 青少年利用图书馆计算机，多半是用来做家庭作业。

synos.tran: 做作业，做功课；做家庭作业
